channel.title: Comments on: Superblog#2: Meet Star Phantom

item.title: By: Jody
item.dc:creator: Jody
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://lunastationquarterly.com/superblog2-meet-star-phantom/#comment-305">Diane Prokop</a>.
Thanks, Diane! You're pretty dang super too!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Diane Prokop.

Thanks, Diane! You’re pretty dang super too!

item.content:encoded: You are both pretty dang super. Pretty dang.

item.title: By: Holly Walrath
item.dc:creator: Holly Walrath
item.description: Digging this blog series Jody! Excited to see more interviews. Spec writing has so many amazing women writers.
item.content:encoded: Digging this blog series Jody! Excited to see more interviews. Spec writing has so many amazing women writers.
